Sub: Application for the suitable post. 
 
Respected Sir, 
 
With high hopes and aspiration I submit myself for a suitable job in your 
esteemed organization. I have completed Diploma in Electrical and Electronics 
Engg and ITI in Electrician Trade. 
 
I feel that your concern will give scope for better growth of my ability. I will 
take the assignment with a great sense of responsibility and enjoy the challenges of the 
situation and make a positive contribution. 
 
As I am young, energetic and talented and full of zeal, I am sure you will top 
my inherent talent to the best advantage of the organization, simultaneously shaping 
my future with bright, promising career. 
 
 
Looking forward for your favorable reply at the earliest to present myself for 
an interview in your Organization. 
 
 Thanking you in anticipation, I remain for your positive response. 
 
 
 
Yours Sincerely, 
 
 RAJESH R
